# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceed. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(input::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(input)
    result = ""
    line_length = 0
    
    for word in words
        if line_length + length(word) > text_width
            result *= "\n"
            line_length = 0
        elseif line_length > 0
            result *= " "
            line_length += 1
        end
        result *= word
        line_length += length(word)
    end
    
    return result
end

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")
```
